CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 9600X 6-Core Processor
OS: Ubuntu_24.04.3_LTS
Date (UTC): 2026-01-01 00:00:00 UTC+0000
------------------------

╔════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╗
║     Sparse Ternary FMA Kernel - Comprehensive Benchmark       ║
║                                                                ║
║  Implementation: AVX-512 (SIMD)
║  AVX-512 Support: Yes
╚════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╝

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
CORRECTNESS TESTS
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

Test 1: Encode/Decode Correctness
----------------------------------
  -1 → 0x02 → -1 [PASS]
   0 → 0x00 →  0 [PASS]
   1 → 0x01 →  1 [PASS]

Test 2: Pack/Unpack Correctness
--------------------------------
  Array size: 1024 trits
  Packed size: 256 bytes (25.0% of original)
  Errors: 0
  Result: [PASS]

Test 3: Ternary Multiply Correctness
-------------------------------------
  12345 × -1 = -12345 (expected -12345) [PASS]
  12345 ×  0 = 0 (expected 0) [PASS]
  12345 ×  1 = 12345 (expected 12345) [PASS]

Test 4: Sparse Ternary FMA Correctness
---------------------------------------
  Array size: 256
  Errors: 0
  Result: [PASS]

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
PERFORMANCE BENCHMARKS
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

Benchmark 1: Encoding Overhead
-------------------------------
  Array size: 4096 trits
  Iterations: 100000
  Pack time: 103.336 ms (1.033 μs/op)
  Unpack time: 118.067 ms (1.181 μs/op)

Benchmark 2: Density Gain Validation
-------------------------------------
  Array size: 4096
  Iterations: 10000
  8-bit encoding: 8.953 ms (0.895 μs/op)
  2-bit encoding: 16.152 ms (1.615 μs/op)
  Speedup: 0.55×
  Memory saved: 3072 bytes (75.0%)

Benchmark 3: SIMD Throughput
-----------------------------
  Array size: 4096
  Iterations: 10000
  Scalar: 16.030 ms (1.603 μs/op)
  SIMD: 10.536 ms (1.054 μs/op)
  Speedup: 1.52×
  Throughput (scalar): 2555.3 Mtrits/s
  Throughput (SIMD): 3887.8 Mtrits/s

Benchmark 4: Sparse Optimization
---------------------------------
  Array size: 4096
  Hamming weight: 128 (3.1%)
  Iterations: 10000
  Dense: 23.202 ms (2.320 μs/op)
  Sparse: 0.409 ms (0.041 μs/op)
  Speedup: 56.79× (theoretical: 32.0×)

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
SUMMARY
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

✓ All correctness tests PASSED
✓ Performance benchmarks completed successfully
